source_reference.text: Video: 'Kingdom Citizenship Success Laws of Marriage | Dr. Myles Munroe' by Dr. Myles Munroe on Munroe Global (Apr 27, 2018)

content_summary: Kingdom Citizenship Success Laws of Marriage | Dr. Myles Munroe
content_detailed:
You can purchase the complete album via the link below. Available on CD, DVD, MP3 & MP4
http://bit.ly/KCSLOM

In this teaching, Dr. Munroe details specific laws for successful marriages the way God intended it to be. He speaks on how husband and a wife should position themselves to properly function in the roles God ordained for them. Your names are directed at birth. Your titles are earned. Marriage is not a name, it is a title. You must earn it. Marriage is not a right, it is a privilege. Marriage is not for children, it is for adults. Marriage is not an event, it is a process. Marriage is not a contract, it is a covenant.
